Standard Form Management

Welcome to the standard form management section of the administration.

You can choose from the following options.

  • Place a form in a specific location on your site.
  • Manage the fields that are available on specific forms.

If this form emails you it will send it to the following email address, and if this form emails a customer then this is the email address that it will send it from allowing customers to reply easily to the email in question.
You can decide if the following fields are available and if they are required.
You have chosen to add a standard form to the web site. Please choose the form and the location you wish the form to appear.
